projects.title: ClinicHub Pro
projects.description: Complete practice management system for modern clinics and health centers
projects.content:
# ClinicHub Pro - Medical Practice Management

A comprehensive solution designed for healthcare professionals to streamline patient management, appointments, and billing.

## Key Features
- Patient appointment scheduling
- Electronic medical records (EMR)
- Integrated billing system
- Real-time notifications
- Multi-clinic support

## Technologies Used
- React for responsive UI
- Node.js backend
- PostgreSQL database
- Stripe for payments

projects.title: ShopMax E-Commerce
projects.description: High-performance online store with advanced inventory and sales analytics
projects.content:
# ShopMax - E-Commerce Platform

A modern e-commerce solution built for rapid scaling and maximum conversion rates.

## Features
- Product catalog with search & filters
- Shopping cart & checkout flow
- Order management
- Analytics dashboard
- Inventory tracking
- SEO optimization

## Tech Stack
- Next.js frontend
- Express.js backend
- PostgreSQL
- Redis for caching

projects.title: BiteFlow - Restaurant Management
projects.description: Digital menu system and restaurant management platform with online ordering
projects.content:
# BiteFlow - Restaurant Digital Solution

Modern solution for restaurants to manage operations and serve customers digitally.

## Features
- Digital menu with images
- Table management
- Online ordering system
- Kitchen display system
- Customer reviews
- Analytics dashboard

## Technology
- React frontend
- Node.js API
- Real-time WebSocket updates
- PostgreSQL database

projects.title: TechCorp Solutions Portal
projects.description: Enterprise corporate website showcasing services and project portfolios
projects.content:
# TechCorp Solutions - Corporate Portal

Professional corporate website designed to establish brand authority and generate leads.

## Components
- Services showcase
- Project portfolio
- Team directory
- Blog section
- Contact management
- Email campaigns

## Stack
- Next.js for SSR
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Headless CMS integration

projects.title: LearnHub Academy
projects.description: Comprehensive learning management system with interactive courses and certification
projects.content:
# LearnHub - E-Learning Platform

Complete LMS solution for education providers to deliver engaging online courses.

## Features
- Course creation and management
- Video streaming
- Interactive quizzes
- Student progress tracking
- Certification system
- Discussion forums
- Live class capabilities

## Technologies
- React components
- Node.js backend
- Video.js for streaming
- PostgreSQL database

projects.title: MERN Hotel Booking Management System
projects.description: Complete hotel booking platform with advanced search, real-time availability, secure payment integration, and comprehensive management system for travelers, hotel owners, and administrators worldwide.
